Posts.Content: My radiation will be after four months as well but that is because I had to have two surgeries, the margins were not clean, first surgery June 19/08 second July 14/08 then I ended up with an infection which took 16 days of antibiotics. started chemo on Aug 26 I will not be done with chemo until the end of Oct and my radiation Ongolist said |need at least 4 weeks if not six weeks after chemo to ensure I have recovered enough to do the 6.5 weeks of daily radiation. It does seem like a long time but when you think what your body is being put through you have to give some time before you attack it again. If however I did not need chemo and was just getting radiation it would have been 10 to 12 weeks from the first surgery. Not sure if that helps you, but I do not think your mom should wait,
Posts.Title: Delaying radiation?

Posts.Content: Can you use George's Cream, not sure if you can get it in the states, it was developed by a pharm. in Calgary AB as it it so dry here, I use this cream all the time and when it comes time to do my radiation after chemo I plan on using it. It really is amazing stuff and I know he sells it all over canada, but I am sure my sister has picked some up in Minn. where she lives. kam
Posts.Title: Rash from radiation

Posts.Content: I also had a really ugly bruise after that lasted several weeks, I did not take to freezing the first time so I just flew off the table that was very painful, but they refroze and then I did not feel the rest of the samples coming out
Posts.Title: Bruising after core needle biopsy normal?
